Skeptic
On Friendly Skill: {colour_start|buff}Buff{colour_end} Self: +2 SPD
Wretched puck! Go back to the shadows!
My mind... get out of my MIND!
"Praesidium adversus daemonicum."

"Yes, Light. I am at your command."
No! The Light... it fades!
The Light has abandoned us!
May the Light preserve us!!
N-no! The darkness! THE DARKNESS!
Demons walk among us!
The Darkness has claimed your twisted souls!
You heathens are plotting my fall from grace!
I sense wickedness in your souls...
The penitent submits his body to the Light!
I suffer for your sins!
Rip me limb from limb! I will be sanctified!
I will find redemption from the pain!
I hope the Light smites you all where you stand!
You are no better than the demons we fight!
Wretched whores and whoresons! All of you!
How did I get saddled with such heathens?
You're nothing but a burden to my holy mission!
The Light has appointed me as the new head of this crusade!
This holy war is mine and mine alone!
Bah! Why should I waste my time saving your souls?
Protect me you faithless whelps! I am a messenger of the Light!
To think I should be made to suffer your stupidity!
The Light...it fades...
Salvation... What's the point anymore, all of us are damned.
But... why? Was it all for naught?
I've failed you all, my friends... I suppose it was a matter of time.
I understand now... Only in death will there be absolution.
AHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAA!!!!
The Light! It burns!
THE LIGHT HAS CHOSEN ME!
Light, sear my soul!
Sinners repent! The end is nigh! AHAHAHAHAHA!!
The Light shines for us, friends! Stay strong!
These shadows are nothing against servants of the Light!
See how they quake before the Light!
Fight! Fight for honor and justice!
The Light will take you all!
The Light has shown me the way to victory!
LUX VULT!
Cower before the Light's radiance, you fiends!
I cannot die. Not now. Not today.
The Light still has a plan for me!
The Lights grants me deliverance!
Lux, misericordiam habeat.
Light, cast your rays upon us!
Lux, da nobis vires ambulare in semita mandatorum tuorum.
May the Light guide this faithful servant's soul!
Lux, nos adversus daemones serva...
Now! Banish these monstrosities in the name of the Light!
They are weakened! Strike for justice!
Behold! A miracle of the Light!
Lux, misericordiam habeat.
The darkness! It surrounds us!
We are lost! LOST!
These demons surround us! Flee while you still can!
Your eyes... So catlike...
Lead me not into temptation, you Demons!
You cast no shadow! You are possessed!
The Light is testing me! Through pain we are absolved!
There is no absolution without punishment!
My blood is anathema to these beasts! You will see!
You all need some sense slapped into you!
Pagans and reprobates. That is what you all are.
Babes in armor, the lot of you!
I am truly surrounded by imbeciles...
I am the only truly righteous one here!
Protect me you dogs! I will be of no use to you dead!
"Praise be to the Light, for..." Oh, what's the point.
No deliverance. No final reward. Just dirt and worms.
I can't even muster the strength to pray...
THE RAPTURE IS UPON US!
The reckoning draws near. Confess thy sins!
BRIMSTONE! HELLFIRE! THE BURNING IN MY SKIN!
I feel the Light has truly forsaken me!
Get back! They are growing stronger!
Vereor nox...
Get away from me, you sinners!
Your eyes, so like a snake...
Do not touch me! You are tainted!
Do you not know? The blood of a saint is a wondrous thing!
It is the Light's will that I suffer for your sins!
The Light protects me!
BEHOLD, A PALE HORSE!
THE ARCHANGEL CHARGES INTO BATTLE!
THE RAPTURE NEEDS MEN ON THE FRONT LINES!
PROVE YOUR WORTH AND DIE FOR ME, MORTALS!
NOW IS YOUR CHANCE TO REPENT BEFORE THE RAPTURE!
GO FORTH, MY ANGELS! KILL FOR ME!
Here. Use my body as a shield...
Take me, demon. You win.
Back. Let them take me first at least.
I just... need a moment, my friends.
What... What am I doing here?
I can't remember my scriptures... what is happening to me?
The Light commands me to slay them from here!
Out of the way! Leave this to me.
I alone know how to exorcise this demon!
You! Distract it while I prepare the exorcism!
You first. I must commune with the Light for guidance.
I see we have a voluntary offering to the Light!
N-no! We should run!
Lux, misericordiam habeat...
Why has the Light forsaken us?!
You'd like me to do that, wouldn't you!
I know your tricks, demon.
You think you can command me, heretic?!
No. It is not the Light's will.
I serve the Light and ONLY the Light.
Your wishes go against the Light. No.
Why fight it?
We would only delay the inevitable. No.
I've accepted the true nature of things. Now leave me be.
YOU ARE NOT WORTHY OF SALVATION!
THE HORNS ARE BLOWING!
OVER THERE! THE BLACK HORSE!
The Light commands me to do this!
You will not catch me off guard, demons!
May the Light cleanse these demons around me!
Behold! The will of the Light shines through my wounds!
LUX VULT!
I will now return the suffering!
Oh, in the name of the Light. Just move over and let me do it.
Must I do everything myself?
You whelps! I'll get us out of this mess you started!
Back! I will get us out of this!
Allow me! The Light wills this to be so!
This is the will of the Light!
I can barely summon the strength to do anything...
What does it matter any more?
The Light has been snuffed. The Light has been snuffed...
UNCLEAN WRETCH! VILE MONSTROSITY!!
I DO THIS FOR YOU, O LIGHT!
THIS IS MY WILL!
Over there! In the shadows!
The Light is gone! The Light is gone!
Wh... What was that?...
I will commune with the Light later tonight. ALONE.
You poor souls. I will perform the proper exorcism when we return to the Hamlet.
I see how your eyes unnaturally flicker against the flame.
I only pray that these scars please the Light.
The Light wills me to bleed. So bleed I shall.
It hurts, so much... But this is the Light's will.
I, for one, cannot wait to be rid of you vermin.
You will not even say grace before eating? Pathetic.
You wretches will never find salvation the way you are going.
The Light is a great burden to bear. I need more sustenance.
Give me your share of the gold! I will pass it on to someone more deserving.
Give me that jewel you found. I will consecrate it. Later.
I apologize for being such a burden on you all.
It pains me to admit... that I just don't care anymore.
All my life spent chasing some higher purpose. And this is the thanks I get.
SINNERS REPENT!
YOUR RECKONING IS NIGH, INFIDELS!
Here I am, demons!
End me! END ME!
The Light shines through my every scar!
Just get it over with.
I will bear the burden. Your lives are worth more than mine.
TAKE ME! TAKE ME TO PARADISE!!
WAR, FAMINE, PESTILENCE...
You have been possessed! Demons, begone!
Return to the pit from whence you came, vile demon!
I honestly hope you BURN.
HERETIC!
RELISH THE PAIN AND REJOICE!!!!
AN ANGEL HAS FALLEN!
Light, heed my sacrifice!
Behold! Stigmata!
It's better if I die by my hand
May the Light forgive me...
Look! My hands! I am chosen! I AM CHOSEN!
LIGHT TAKE ME!!
And here I thought demons loved chaos. Cowards...
You're not going anywhere, demon.
Just let it happen.
No. Let our deaths be quick.
Run? In our moment of triumph?
Scars are nothing to fear! They strengthen you!
STAY AND WAIT! THE RAPTURE IS UPON US!!
WE WILL BE TAKEN TO PARADISE!!!
Light have mercy, no!
V-vade retro! VADE RETRO!
You let that happen! You're with THEM!
That look... I know it well. You made that happen, didn't you? DEMON!
Protect me! I am your guiding light!
To me, you fools! To me!
You only confirm your own demise, fiends!
Watch! They burn at the touch of my blood!
IT HURTS! GLORY BE!!
AHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!! YES!!!!!
REJOICE!!!
THE BROKEN ARE THE MOST BLESSED!!!!
They toy with us! The monsters!
P-praesidium... adversus...
You are allowing these fiends to torment me! Fie!
Which one of you hexed me?!
Strike me down and see what comes of it, demon!
Why miss? I have precious blood to give!
THE LIGHT PROTECTS ME FROM YOUR WRETCHED WAYS!
I AM IMMUNE! THE LIGHT IS MY SHIELD!
Fool! I could have banished it from this realm!
Had I done so, I would have ensured it would never return.
I thought you were a learned warrior. That was pathetic.
Do it properly next time or you will be declared a traitor.
YES!! YOU HAVE PROVED YOUR WORTH TO THE LIGHT!!
REJOICE!!! THE LIGHT HAS GUIDED YOUR HAND!!!
They are too powerful! Flee!
They are invincible! Run for your lives!
A demon cannot attack one's own. Remove the guise, imp!
No lie is safe, demon. I see your plan.
One more move like that and I will have you excommunicated.
Pitiful. The Light has no use for you.
I could have done a better job myself.
Idiot! Are you trying to get us all killed?
FEAR NOT! THE LIGHT WILL FORGIVE YOU FOR YOUR FAULTS!
FEAR NOT! THE LIGHT WILL REDEEM YOU!
All is lost! Why pretend otherwise!
We are tarrying too long! We should flee while we can!
Another ruse. Keep trying, demon.
You are a sly one, demon. But you cannot fool me.
The Light will reward you for your suffering!
Your wounds please the Light! Glory be!
Pathetic. You can't even die right.
You never fail to disappoint.
FEAR NOT! THE LIGHT WILL GRANT YOU A SWIFT DEATH!
YOU WILL BE REWARDED FOR YOUR BRAVERY IN PARADISE!!
We are toys to them! Toys!
They are predators! Playing with their meals!
You cannot pretend forever, demon.
Your mask is starting to slip.
A SIGN! THE LIGHT PROTECTS YOU!!
IT IS A MIRACLE! A MIRACLE!!!
No! No! NOOOO!
M-my feet plant me still!
Trying to run off, are you. Scum.
And just where do you think you're going?
No. This is a trial of the Light.
We must bleed! The Light wishes it so!
Coward.
Trying to run off with your tail 'twixt your legs?
I AM GROUNDED AS A MOUNTAIN!!
STAY AND WAIT FOR THE RECKONING!!!
No. You have cursed it. I know.
I can smell your brimstone from here. No.
I must bleed for the Light!
This penance is for all of your sins. I cannot accept.
Just leave me be.
That won't help... I already know it.
FOOL! I DO NOT NEED SUCH WORLDLY BOONS!
I ONLY ACCEPT RELIQUARIES OF THE LIGHT!
Keep your heathen practices to yourself.
A witch! Touch me and I will see you burned at the stake.
I want nothing to do with your blasphemous litanies.
You would heal the wounds of a martyr?
My scars are proof of my devotion!
How dare you touch my stigmata!
Why prolong it.
There is no healing a lout like me.
I don't deserve your compassion.
BLOOD! BLOOD! BLOOOOOOD!!!
HARK! THE HORN IS BLOWING!
THE SEVENTH SEAL IS BROKEN!!
Don't touch me, pagan.
Ha! I know what you are. Keep your twisted claws off me.
Trying to possess me as well, Demon? I know your tricks!
No, NO! This hardship gives me clarity!
The Light is guiding me through this ordeal!
This pain is a blessing in disguise.
Why pretend? We've already lost.
You still have faith in me? You poor fool...
The Light has failed us. What hope do we have?
DO YOU NOT SEE THE RED HORSE?!
ONLY THE LIGHT CAN AMPLIFY MY STRENGTH!
I HAVE ASCENDED!!!
Ad mortem!
The Light compels you!
Lux vult!
Vadite retro daemones!
You HERETIC!
Ashes to ashes.
Dust to dust.
Cinis ad cinerem.
Pulvis ad pulverem.
Get back! Don't let it touch you again!
Cut them down or we will be overwhelmed!
Do not heed its whispers! It will lie and deceive!
Lux, defende nos in proelio.
Worry not, child. The Light rewards those who combat evil.
What are shadows, but servants of the Light?
Here. Let me cleanse your wounds.
You are recovering already. Praise the Light.
This holy water will consecrate your scars.
Lux, contra nequitiam et insidias daemonum esto praesidium.
Even the darkest of nights breaks before the dawn.
Lux, veni in auxilium hominum...
Quidquid Latine dictum sit, altum videtur.
REPLACEME
REPLACEME
REPLACEME
Wh.. What am I doing? Flee! Flee while we still can!
The darkness has won! We are wasting time here!
We cannot linger! They will return at any minute!
Never in my life will I assist demons!
You are not the compatriot I once knew! Get away from me!
You think I would help you all after all of the whispers behind my back?
This is another test of the Light. I cannot.
The Light does not will it. Who am I to question its plans?
I cannot! The Light demands hardship from us!
Vermin. You do not deserve my blessings.
Perform three days of penance, then perhaps I will reconsider.
I saw you exiting the brothel last week. Repent!
They did not even say grace! They don't deserve my help!
The Light wills me to survive. As for the rest of you...
I am sorry, but... you are unworthy.
Why bother. The Light is gone.
I have nothing left to give. I feel so empty.
I just need to rest for a minute...
MAGGOT. YOU ARE NOT WORTHY OF THE LIGHT.
SINNER! REPENT!!!
YOU ARE UNWORTHY OF FORGIVENESS, WRETCH.
You're trying to curse me, aren't you? Witch! WITCH!
I know your ways. You would put a hex on me as soon as my back is turned!
Get back, demon! Don't you dare lay hands on me!
I cannot. The Light is testing my resolve.
I must suffer! The Light wills it!
From you? I think not.
Don't touch me, heretic.
No. I am spent.
Please. Leave me be.
HOW DARE YOU. HOW DARE YOU PRESUME ME TO BE A MORTAL.
COWER BEFORE ME, YOU CHILD OF SIN.
I saw your fingers! You hexed it!
Who do you take me for, witch? Surely it is poisoned!
The Light demands I fast for the week.
No. The Light is testing me.
You have it. I don't feel too well.
Just let me rest...
DO NOT PRESUME MY FLESH SO WEAK TO SUCCUMB TO HUNGER!
I HAVE ASCENDED BEYOND SUCH PHYSICAL NEEDS!

Ego te baptizo in nomine Lucis.
Lux, defende nos in proelio, contra nequitiam et insidias diaboli esto praesidium.
Exsurgat Lux et dissipentur inimici eius...
These candles should ward off any demons that dare stalk us this night.
Sicut fluit cera a facie ignis, sic pereant peccatores a facie Lucis...
Exsurgat Lux et dissipentur inimici eius!
THE LIGHT COMPELS YOU! BEGONE!

Reclaimed Symbol, Restored Prayer Book
Anointed Symbol, Sacred Prayer Book

Vestments

A powerful disruptive combatant, the Exorcist calls upon his unwavering faith in combat to smite his foes, condemning them with holy magic. A lifetime of servitude has made him terrifyingly effective at banishing unholy monstrosities and eldritch evils. His knowledge of prayers allows him to fortify his teammates by rallying them to his zealous cause.

A zealous firebrand of the Light, the Exorcist wears naught but his clerical vestments into combat. In lieu of traditional weapons, he channels divine magic through his holy symbol - and, should the need arise, he will beat back his enemies with his heavy prayer book.

The Exorcist calls on his knowledge of a sacred tongue to rally his teammates for the battles to come, with those of faith finding themselves particularly inspired by his infectious zeal. He may also protect them from the terrors of the night, cleanse his allies' wounds with holy water, and even banish wicked demons from their bodies - although such an act extracts a heavy toll.
Dies irae...
Memento mori...
A Firebrand Arrives
The ill rumors surrounding the Hamlet have drawn travelers from far and wide. This holy man is one such soul; although his methods are questionable, his efficacy cannot be denied.
A Boon Granted?
The townsfolk's prayers and tithes have not gone unnoticed, drawing the attention of some of the more... ardent preachers of the church.
A Terrible Presence

A local monger awoke the Hamlet in the night, terrifying the villagers with his screaming and writhing. Hoping against hope that the worst has not come to pass, his family have resorted to desperate measures to cure his affliction.
The Light calls to me.
This is a house of sin!
I will not associate with these sons of perdition!
Sinners! Repent!

Vestments

A powerful disruptive combatant, the Exorcist calls upon his unwavering faith in combat to smite his foes, condemning them with holy magic. A lifetime of servitude has made him terrifyingly effective at banishing unholy monstrosities and eldritch evils. His knowledge of prayers allows him to fortify his teammates by rallying them to his zealous cause.

A zealous firebrand of the Light, the Exorcist wears naught but his clerical vestments into combat. In lieu of traditional weapons, he channels divine magic through his holy symbol - and, should the need arise, he will beat back his enemies with his heavy prayer book.

The Exorcist calls on his knowledge of a sacred tongue to rally his teammates for the battles to come, with those of faith finding themselves particularly inspired by his infectious zeal. He may also protect them from the terrors of the night, cleanse his allies' wounds with holy water, and even banish wicked demons from their bodies - although such an act extracts a heavy toll.

Um poderoso combatente disruptivo, o Exorcista invoca sua f inabalvel no combate para ferir seus inimigos, condenando-os com magia sagrada. Uma vida inteira de servido tornou-o terrivelmente eficaz em banir monstruosidades e males demonacos. Seu conhecimento de oraes permite que ele fortifique seus companheiros de equipe, reunindo-os sua causa zelosa.

Um zeloso agitador da Luz, o Exorcista no usa nada alm de suas vestes sagradas em combate. Em vez de armas tradicionais, ele canaliza a magia divina atravs de seu smbolo sagrado - e, em caso de necessidade, ele derrotar seus inimigos com seu pesado livro de oraes.

O Exorcista usa seu conhecimento por uma lngua sagrada para reunir seus companheiros de equipe para as batalhas que esto por vir. Os religiosos se encontram particularmente inspirados por seu zelo contagiante. Ele tambm pode proteg-los dos terrores da noite, limpar as feridas de seus aliados com gua benta e at banir os demnios perversos de seus corpos - embora tal ato extraia um pesado tributo.

Vestments

A powerful disruptive combatant, the Exorcist calls upon his unwavering faith in combat to smite his foes, condemning them with holy magic. A lifetime of servitude has made him terrifyingly effective at banishing unholy monstrosities and eldritch evils. His knowledge of prayers allows him to fortify his teammates by rallying them to his zealous cause.

A zealous firebrand of the Light, the Exorcist wears naught but his clerical vestments into combat. In lieu of traditional weapons, he channels divine magic through his holy symbol - and, should the need arise, he will beat back his enemies with his heavy prayer book.

The Exorcist calls on his knowledge of a sacred tongue to rally his teammates for the battles to come, with those of faith finding themselves particularly inspired by his infectious zeal. He may also protect them from the terrors of the night, cleanse his allies' wounds with holy water, and even banish wicked demons from their bodies - although such an act extracts a heavy toll.

A Firebrand Arrives
The ill rumors surrounding the Hamlet have drawn travelers from far and wide. This holy man is one such soul; although his methods are questionable, his efficacy cannot be denied.
A Boon Granted?
The townsfolk's prayers and tithes have not gone unnoticed, drawing the attention of some of the more... ardent preachers of the church.
A Terrible Presence

A local monger awoke the Hamlet in the night, terrifying the villagers with his screaming and writhing. Hoping against hope that the worst has not come to pass, his family have resorted to desperate measures to cure his affliction.

Combattant puissant et turbulent, l'Exorciste fait appel sa foi inbranlable en combat pour frapper ses ennemis, les condamnant grce sa magie divine. Une vie de servitude l'a rendu terriblement efficace dans le banissement des monstruosit et autres horreurs surnaturelles. Ses litanies galvanisent ses allis en les ralliant sa pieuse cause.

Fervent hraut de la Lumire, l'Exorciste ne porte que ses vtements liturgiques en combat. Au lieu d'armes traditionnelles, il concentre la magie divine travers son emblme sacr - et, si le besoin se fait sentir, il repousse ses ennemies l'aide de son lourd livre de prire.

L'Exorciste utilise une langue sacre pour rallier ses compagnons devant les battailles venir, les fidles se retrouvant particulirement inspirs par son zle contagieux. Il sait aussi les protger des horreurs de la nuit, nettoyer leurs plaies l'aide d'eau bnite, et mme bannir les dmons malafaisants de leurs corps - mme si un tel acte implique un lourd prix payer.

Gewnder

Ein starker disruptiver Kmpfer, der Exorzist benutzt seinen felsenfesten Glauben im Kampf um seine Feinde zu zerschlagen, verurteilt sie mit heiliger Magie. Der lebenslange Dienst hat ihn sehr effektiv darin gemacht, Monstrositten und Eldritch zu vertreiben .Sein Wissen ber Gebete erlaubt es ihm, seine Verbndeten zu verstrken, indem er sie fr seine Sache zusammenscharrt.

Ein Hitzkopf des Lichts, der Exorzist trgt nichts auer seiner geistlichen Gewnder im Kampf. Anstelle von traditionellen Waffen, benutzt er seine Symbole, um durch sie Magie zu wirken - und,sollte es so weit kommen, benutzt er auch gerne sein Gebetsbuch um den Gegnern eine berzuziehen.

Der Exorzist benutzt sein Wissen um Verbndete fr kommende Kmpfe zu wappnen, was besonders auf Glubige wirkt, die sich sehr zu seinem Eifer hingezogen fhlen. Er beschtzt sie auerdem vor den Gefahren der Nacht, reinigt ihre Wunden mit heiligem Wasser, und treibt ihnen sogar bsartige Dmonen aus - auch wenn diese Aktion einen schweren Preis mit sich bringt.

Paramenti

Un potente combattente dirompente, l'Esorcista richiama la sua fede incrollabile in combattimento per fulminare i suoi avversari, condannandoli con magia sacra. Una vita di servizio lo ha reso estremamente efficace nel bandire mostruosit profane e mali sovrannaturali. La sua conoscenza delle preghiere gli permette di fortificare i suoi alleati chiamandoli a raccolta alla sua causa infervorata.

Un fanatico marchiato col fuoco servo della Luce, l'Esorcista non indossa altro che i suoi paramenti sacerdotali in combattimento. Al posto di armi tradizionali, convoglia magia divina tramite il suo simbolo sacro - e, dovesse averne bisogno, respinger i suoi nemici con il suo pesante libro delle preghiere.

L'Esorcista richiama la sua conoscenza di una lingua sacra per chiamare a raccolta i suoi alleati per le battaglie future, con coloro di fede che si sentono particolarmente ispirati dal suo fervore contagioso. Pu anche proteggerli dai terrori della notte, purificare le ferite dei suoi alleati con acqua santa, e perfino bandire demoni malvagi dai loro corpi - anche se tale atto richiede un pesante costo.
Dies irae...
Memento mori...
Un Marchio di fuoco Arriva
Le dicerie funeste riguardo il Borgo hanno attratto viandanti in lungo e in largo. Questo sant'uomo non eccezione; anche se i suoi metodi sono discutibili, la sua efficacia non pu essere negata.
Una Benedizione Ricevuta?
Le preghiere e decime dei paesani non sono andate inosservate, attirando l'attenzione dei pi... ferventi predicatori della chiesa.
Una Terribile Presenza

Un mercante locale ha svegliato il Borgo durante la notte, terrorizzando i paesani con le sue grida e convulsioni. Sperando contro ogni logica che il peggio non sia passato, la sua famiglia ha fatto ricorso a misure disperate per curare la sua afflizione.
La Luce mi chiama.
Questa una casa di peccato!
Non mi associer con questa prole della perdizione!
Peccatori! Pentitevi!

Vestments

A powerful disruptive combatant, the Exorcist calls upon his unwavering faith in combat to smite his foes, condemning them with holy magic. A lifetime of servitude has made him terrifyingly effective at banishing unholy monstrosities and eldritch evils. His knowledge of prayers allows him to fortify his teammates by rallying them to his zealous cause.

A zealous firebrand of the Light, the Exorcist wears naught but his clerical vestments into combat. In lieu of traditional weapons, he channels divine magic through his holy symbol - and, should the need arise, he will beat back his enemies with his heavy prayer book.

The Exorcist calls on his knowledge of a sacred tongue to rally his teammates for the battles to come, with those of faith finding themselves particularly inspired by his infectious zeal. He may also protect them from the terrors of the night, cleanse his allies' wounds with holy water, and even banish wicked demons from their bodies - although such an act extracts a heavy toll.

Egzorcysta, poty i destrukcyjny bojownik, wzywa i moc swej niezmnej wiary, by z jej pomocraziwych wrog zsyatenie. Jego posga uczyni go przerajo skutecznym w odpaniu zar plugawych monstrjak i nadprzyrodzonego z. Znajomo modlitwy pozwala mu pokrzepiwych towarzyszy poprzez zjednoczenie w jego ij misji.

Egzorcysta, niezmny orwnik iati, wdziewa do bitwy jedynie swe szaty duchownego. Miast konwencjonalnej broni wykorzystuje swwi symbol, by przelewarzezeboskmoc, a gdy zajdzie taka potrzeba pobije wroga pomocswego ciiego modlitewnika.

Egzorcysta dzi znajomoi igo jka, jak i swej zaraiwej gorliwoi, potrafi zjednawych religijnych towarzyszy i zainspirowach do boju. Mo chronich przed groami nocy, przemywaany wodin a nawet wypa ich ciademony - co jednakowozbiera swe iwo.

Un poderoso combatiente disruptivo, el Exorcista recurre a su inquebrantable fe en el combate para herir a sus enemigos, condenndolos con magia sagrada. Una vida de servidumbre lo ha hecho terriblemente eficaz para desterrar monstruosidades impas y males tenebrosos. Su conocimiento de las oraciones le permite fortalecer a sus compaeros de equipo, uniendolos a su justa causa.

Una fiera ardiente de la Luz, el Exorcista no usa nada ms que sus vestiduras clericales en combate. En lugar de las armas tradicionales, canaliza la magia divina a travs de su santo smbolo y, si surge la necesidad, vencer a sus enemigos con su pesado libro de oraciones.

El Exorcista recurre a su conocimiento de la lengua sagrada para reunir a sus compaeros de equipo para las batallas venideras, y aquellos que comparten su fe se encuentran particularmente inspirados por su contagioso entusiasmo. Tambin puede protegerlos de los terrores de la noche, limpiar las heridas de sus aliados con agua bendita e incluso desterrar a los demonios malvados de sus cuerpos, aunque tal acto tiene un alto costo.
Dies irae...

Un favor concedido?

Vestments

A powerful disruptive combatant, the Exorcist calls upon his unwavering faith in combat to smite his foes, condemning them with holy magic. A lifetime of servitude has made him terrifyingly effective at banishing unholy monstrosities and eldritch evils. His knowledge of prayers allows him to fortify his teammates by rallying them to his zealous cause.

A zealous firebrand of the Light, the Exorcist wears naught but his clerical vestments into combat. In lieu of traditional weapons, he channels divine magic through his holy symbol - and, should the need arise, he will beat back his enemies with his heavy prayer book.

The Exorcist calls on his knowledge of a sacred tongue to rally his teammates for the battles to come, with those of faith finding themselves particularly inspired by his infectious zeal. He may also protect them from the terrors of the night, cleanse his allies' wounds with holy water, and even banish wicked demons from their bodies - although such an act extracts a heavy toll.
Dies irae...

A Firebrand Arrives
The ill rumors surrounding the Hamlet have drawn travelers from far and wide. This holy man is one such soul; although his methods are questionable, his efficacy cannot be denied.
A Boon Granted?
The townsfolk's prayers and tithes have not gone unnoticed, drawing the attention of some of the more... ardent preachers of the church.
A Terrible Presence

A local monger awoke the Hamlet in the night, terrifying the villagers with his screaming and writhing. Hoping against hope that the worst has not come to pass, his family have resorted to desperate measures to cure his affliction.
